entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Wreckhouse

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 10:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Wind: ESE 82 km/h gust 108 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 100 except gusting to 140 in the Wreckhouse area near noon. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
